original_title: 欲求不満な上司に相部屋で朝まで痴女られ続けたボク 巨チンが取り柄のボクは性欲尽きるまで一晩中犯されまくり
overview: Aizawa Minami is a very capable boss on a business trip with an incompetent employee.  He gets surprised when he finds out that he will share a room with her, but even more surprised when she struck him with a question: “You can’t work, so at least proof that you’re a man”.  He could barely handle Minami, who was amazing.
title: My Frustrated Boss became a Slut on our Shared Room Until Morning – Aizawa Minami
